column2: HI DMV PERMIT TEST
Question Text
1. A driver should be extra alert for motorcyclists, bicycles and pedestrians. Why?
column4: They are hard to see in traffic.

column2: 2. To avoid becoming an aggressive driver, you should:
column4: Allow enough travel time to reach your destination on schedule.
column8: Adjust your schedule to drive during times with the most highway traffic.

column2: 3. Regulation signs normally are:
4. The picture shows:
5. This regulatory sign tells drivers that:
column4: traffic in the right lane must go straight.
column6: traffic in the left lane must turn left at the intersection ahead.
column8: all vehicles must turn left immediately.

column2: 6. Your driver’s license has expired. You may:
column4: not drive, but you may renew your driver’s license within a year after the expiration following normal license renewal steps.
column6: drive as long as you are accompanied by a licensed driver.
column8: drive to and from work only.
column10: drive during the grace period of 180 days.

column2: 7. Which of the following must you obey over the others?
8. Increasing your vehicle’s speed _____ your field of vision.
9. This sign means:
column4: You must yield the right-of-way ahead

column2: 10. This road sign means:
column6: Don’t park next to the traffic signal
column10: The traffic signal ahead is out of order

13. The yield sign is ___ and white, with ___ letters.
14. What is the slow moving vehicle symbol?
15. A steady yellow light means that a ______ light will soon appear.
16. A green arrow used to control turns from a specific traffic lane:
column4: means the same as a circular green light, but you must go only in the direction indicated by the arrow.
column6: is used only on one-way streets.
column8: means that you may go only if the green arrow is accompanied by a green light.
column10: provide directional and mileage information to specific destinations.

column2: 17. If the entrance lane is too short to allow acceleration to expressway speed, you should:
column4: reduce your speed to 15 MPH or less and blend with traffic.
column6: stop and wait for a large space in traffic.
column8: accelerate to expressway speed and blend with traffic.
column10: enter the expressway and accelerate quickly.

column2: 18. This sign means:
column4: no turns are allowed on this road.
column8: the road may be slippery when wet.

column2: 19. This road sign means:
column6: Traffic flows only in the direction of the arrow

column2: 20. Which of the following is a defensive driving skill/technique?
column4: Do not drive if you are very weary.
column6: Keep your vehicle in good condition.

column2: 21. This sign indicates:
column4: that you must not drive past this sign.
column6: that you must yield the right-of-way.
column8: the entrance to a dead-end street.
column10: the entrance to a construction site.

column2: 22. A broken white line:
column4: marks the right edge of the roadway.
column6: separates two lanes traveling in the same direction.
column8: means passing or crossing is prohibited in that lane.

column2: 23. Speed limit signs are:
24. You are driving on a four-lane divided highway, two vehicles are driving side by side ahead of you, and you are in a hurry. You should:
column4: drive closely behind the vehicle in the left lane and flash your headlights.
column6: drive in either lane with at least a two-second time interval behind the vehicle ahead.
column8: drive closely behind the vehicles ahead changing lanes frequently.
column10: drive closely behind the vehicle in the right lane.

column2: 25. Regulatory signs:
column4: are diamond shaped and yellow or green.
column8: provide information about the road rules and traffic laws.
column10: regulate the flow of traffic at school zone.

column2: 26. BAC is expressed in:
column8: ounces of alcohol in your blood.

column2: 27. This road sign means:
column10: You may turn right after yielding the right-of-way to oncoming traffic

column2: 28. Air bags are meant to _________ seat belts.
29. This sign warns of a ________ ahead.
30. When they approach this sign, drivers must:
column6: slow down and watch for children crossing the road.
